commit 4642020339f07a3fd2521d6be3bcc49d2f93c389
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Sep 8 01:46:45 2013 -0700

    VMware: datastore regex not honoured
    
    Commit 9408d79e7413aadcba52a61b7a33164090785e4f did not pass the
    datastore regular expression to the VMOps class. This resulted in the
    configured parameter being ignored.
    
    Fixes bug: 1222349
    
    Change-Id: I0c7619b281662121f353c04e07331404d747b28b
